contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=August 2009}} {{Infobox anthem |title = {{lang|ss|Nkulunkulu Mnikati wetibusiso temaSwati}} |english_title =O Lord is our God, Swaziland |image =Flag-map of Swaziland.svg |image_size = |caption = |prefix = National |country = {{SWZ}} |author =Andrease Enoke Fanyana Simelane |lyrics_date = |composer =David Kenneth Rycroft |music_date = |adopted =1968 |sound = |sound_title = }} "'''{{lang|ss|Nkulunkulu Mnikati wetibusiso temaSwati}}'''" is the [[national anthem]] of [[Swaziland]]. It is a compromise between Swazi and western styles of music, and was adopted after independence in 1968.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.nationalanthems.info/sz.htm |title=Swaziland |work=nationalanthems.info |accessdate=2009-10-04}}</ref> == Lyrics == {| cellpadding="6"; align="left" ! [[siSwati]] lyrics ! English translation |- |valign="top"| {{lang|ss| : Nkulunkulu Mnikati wetibusiso temaSwati; : Siyatibonga tonkhe tinhlanhla; : Sibonga iNgwenyama yetfu. : Live netintsaba nemifula. : Busisa tiphatsimandla takaNgwane; : Nguwe wedvwa Somandla wetfu; : Sinike kuhlakanipha lokungenabucili : Simise usicinise, Simakadze.}} |valign="top"| :O Lord our God, bestower of the blessings of the Swazi; :We give Thee thanks for all our good fortune; :We offer thanks and praise for our King :And for our fair land, its hills and rivers. :Thy blessings be on all rulers of our Country; : Thine alone is our Lord; :We pray Thee to grant us wisdom without deceit or malice. :Establish and fortify us, Lord Eternal. |} <br style="clear:left;"> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://nationalanthems.me/swaziland-nkulunkulu-mnikati-wetibusiso-temaswati/ Audio of the national anthem of Swaziland, with information and lyrics] {{National Anthems of Africa}} [[Category:National anthems]] [[Category:Swazi music]] [[Category:National symbols of Swaziland]] {{Swaziland-stub}}
